External Keyboard and Mouse: Connecting an external keyboard and mouse can improve typing comfort and accuracy.
Ergonomic Laptop Case: An ergonomic laptop case can provide support for the user's back and wrists.
Laptop Cooling Pad: A cooling pad can help prevent overheating and extend the laptop's lifespan.
USB Hub: A USB hub can add more ports to the laptop, allowing for more peripherals to be connected.
Privacy Screen Filter: A privacy screen filter can prevent others from seeing what is being displayed on the laptop screen.
